Constructs the UI, populating the combo boxes for parishes and municipalities from the data loaded in App.getPropertyRecords(), and setting up two radio buttons for choosing either parish or municipality scope.

Calculates the planar area of a parcel, using ST_Area(geometry) in the database.

Determines if two geometries (in WKT form) "touch" each other.
areDisjoint(String, String) - Static method in class iscteiul.ista.GeometryUtils
Determines if two WKT geometries are completely disjoint, meaning they have no boundary or interior points in common.
arePropertiesAdjacent(PropertyRecord, PropertyRecord) - Static method in class iscteiul.ista.PropertyUtils

D

distance(int, int) - Static method in class iscteiul.ista.PostGISUtils
Returns the shortest planar distance between two parcel geometries (in the unit of the layer’s SRID – for EPSG : 4326 that is metres when your data are in a projected CRS, otherwise degrees).

distanceToFunchal(int) - Static method in class iscteiul.ista.PostGISUtils
Computes the shortest planar distance between the given property (by objectId) and the "Funchal (Sé)" property in the database with PostGISUtils.FUNCHAL_SE_OBJECT_ID.
distanceToFunchal(int) - Static method in class iscteiul.ista.PropertyUtils
Computes the distance between the centroids of the given property (by its objectID) and the pre-loaded Funchal (Sé) reference property stored in App.getFunchalPropertyRecord().
distanceToMachico(int) - Static method in class iscteiul.ista.PropertyUtils
Computes the distance between the centroids of the given property (by its objectID) and the pre-loaded Machico reference property stored in App.getMachicoPropertyRecord().
doIntersect(String, String) - Static method in class iscteiul.ista.GeometryUtils
Checks if two WKT geometries intersect in any way (their boundaries or interiors overlap).

ExportToGephiUtils - Class in iscteiul.ista

findTouching(int) - Static method in class iscteiul.ista.PostGISUtils
Finds all parcels in the database that touch (share a boundary but do not overlap) the parcel whose objectID is given.

Graph - Class in iscteiul.ista
A Graph representation where each node is a property (with selected attributes), and edges connect properties that are adjacent (touching) based on their geometry.

Constructs the Graph from a list of PropertyRecord objects.

iscteiul.ista - package iscteiul.ista
 

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class iscteiul.ista.App
Main method: loads the CSV, filters by parish, builds a Graph, picks a random property from the subset, and compares adjacency using two methods.
main(String[]) - Static method in class iscteiul.ista.ExportToGephiUtils
Main method: Reads property records from CSV via CSVFileReader. Filters them by parish ("Arco da Calheta"). Builds a GraphStream graph (with attributes for "owner", "shapeArea"). Exports to "output.gexf" using FileSinkGEXF.
main(String[]) - Static method in class iscteiul.ista.PostGISUtils
Minimal command-line demonstration: Reads the CSV (via CSVFileReader) into memory. (Optional) calls PostGISUtils.insertPropertyRecords(List) exactly once to populate the database table. Prompts for an objectID and prints neighbors for four standard predicates: ST_Touches, ST_Intersects, ST_Overlaps, ST_Contains.
mergeAdjacentPropertiesSameOwner(List<PropertyRecord>) - Static method in class iscteiul.ista.PropertyUtils
Merges properties belonging to the same owner if they are adjacent (touching).
MergedPropertyGraph - Class in iscteiul.ista
Builds a graph of "merged properties" where each vertex is a property (resulting from merging same-owner polygons), and an edge indicates these two merged properties are neighbors (their polygons touch).
mergeSameOwner(List<PropertyRecord>) - Static method in class iscteiul.ista.PropertyMerger
Merges properties of the same owner that are adjacent (touch each other).

O

OwnerGraph - Class in iscteiul.ista
Represents a graph of owners, where each node is an owner (identified by owner ID), and edges indicate that these owners have at least one pair of adjacent properties.
OwnerGraph() - Constructor for class iscteiul.ista.OwnerGraph
Constructs an empty OwnerGraph using a SimpleGraph.

PropertyGraph - Class in iscteiul.ista
The PropertyGraph class constructs and manages a graph of PropertyRecord objects, where edges represent adjacency (shared boundaries) between properties.
PropertyGraph() - Constructor for class iscteiul.ista.PropertyGraph
Constructs an empty PropertyGraph with a SimpleGraph and an STRtree for spatial indexing.
PropertyMerger - Class in iscteiul.ista
Utility class for merging properties of the same owner that share boundaries, resulting in one "merged" property per connected component.
PropertyRecord - Class in iscteiul.ista
Represents an immutable record of a property, including its geometry, area, ownership, and location details (parish, municipality, island).

Constructs an immutable PropertyRecord with all required fields.
